question: In which nation "Mount Nyiragongo", an active stratovolcano, is located?
explanation: Mount Nyiragongo is an active stratovolcano located inside the Virunga National Park of the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is a part of the Virunga Mountains of the Albertine Rift. Mount Nyiragongo is one of the sixteen Decade Volcanoes of the world. It lies adjacent to Lake Kivu. Mount Nyamuragira also lies adjacent to Mount Nyiragongo which together constitutes for 40% of Africa's historical volcanic eruptions. It had several deadly eruptions in 1997 and 2002. It also poses an ongoing threat of deadly localized carbon dioxide toxicity known as "Mazuku" which killed several children's recently
